duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct routine experiments using molecular, cell biology, and biochemistry techniques.
Record, transcribe, and analyze test results using basic statistics.
May operate and maintain complex lab equipment.
Assist with planning research procedures and coordinating schedules of tests and procedures.
Prepare written and/or verbal reports on the status of research and technical procedures, including statistical and graphic summaries of findings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Life Sciences or related scientific field
